summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 242 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 958 m), feels like temperature (up 1.9°C), inside temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 1.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 241.9m lower than yesterday, 74.7m lower than the past week, 957.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1744.5m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Periods of rain anticipated, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Weather could become unsettled.
